ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?
I am a very large sea creature with a big mouth and lots of teeth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Other fish are scared of me.

ocean.question: I am a type of fish that is flat and lives on the bottom of the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🛌 I like to rest on the sea floor.
👀 Both my eyes are on one side!

ocean.question: I am a very big mammal that lives in the ocean and spouts water from my head. Who am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I sing songs under the sea.

ocean.question: I am a slow sea creature that carries my home on my back. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat sea grass

ocean.question: I live in a shell and can be found on the beach. Some people like to eat me! Who am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can find me in sand.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. I have a special home. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in a sea anemone.

ocean.question: I am a spiky sea animal that can move slowly across the ocean floor. Watch out for my spines! Who am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have many arms, but I'm not an octopus.
🌵 I have spines all over my body.

ocean.question: I am a very long and skinny fish that hides in the sand, looking like a garden plant. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I am shaped like a snake.
🏖️ I hide in the sand at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a type of algae that forms giant underwater forests. Many sea creatures live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I'm like a forest, but underwater.
🏡 Fish and other creatures hide in me.

transport.question: I have wheels and you ride me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👦👧 You can ride me on the sidewalk.

transport.question: I go 'Choo Choo' and travel on tracks. What am I?
I fly high in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I am faster than a car.
🌎 I can fly across the ocean.

transport.question: I drive on the road and take lots of children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🎒 I stop to pick you up.

transport.question: I sail on the water and can carry many people or cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a rowboat.
🚢 I can travel across the sea.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people when they are sick. What am I?
I am like a motorcycle, but I have three wheels and am very stable. What am I?

hints.text: 🛵 You sit on me like a motorcycle.
🔺 I am often used for deliveries.
⬣ I have a seat in the back.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I don't have wings like an airplane.
🌪️ My top spins around and around.

transport.question: I can travel underwater and sometimes carry people to explore the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I can be bright red, but many different colors too.
🐠 I can see fish from inside.
⬇️ I go deep under the sea.

transport.question: I am very fast and can take people to outer space. What am I?
